data.caption: Clarification/Confirmation On News Item Appearing In "Www.Cnbctv18.Com"
data.news_body: Clarification/Confirmation on news item appearing in "www.cnbc18.com"

data.caption: Clarification sought from Delta Corp Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Delta Corp Ltd on January 10 2025 with reference to news appeared in www.cnbctv18.com dated January 10 2025 quoting "Delta Corp Nazara Tech shares surge over 15% after big relief from Supreme Court"

The reply is awaited.
